title: Problems with "Retrieving data from server" or "Unknown error"
body:
Hey to all of you,

Recently, it has come to my attention that I am facing a reoccurring problem with either my launcher or my connection to the Riot/OCE servers. Whenever, I try to do an activity that requires the connection of my computer/launcher to the Riot Servers; such as the store, looking up my profile, starting a game or even in champion select, it will:

1.) Take a long time to load and then, it comes up with "Retrieving data from server"

http://i.stack.imgur.com/lmSG9.png

2.) Say that I'm in queue when I'm clearly not

3.) A popup will occur and tell me that an "Unknown error has occurred"  

http://i.stack.imgur.com/0M6Eu.png
(if photo unavailable, a quote of what it says) vvvv
"                                                                                                                                                                                            "
   Unknown Error

   An unknown error has occurred

   Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server.

   If you continue encountering this error you may want to check the support site or forum for more information
"                                                                                                                                                                                              "


Seeing this message, I researched for a solution and thus I have tried:

1.) Repairing the launcher
2.) Deleting the patch folders (Don't really remember but deleted something) and then repairing the launcher
3.) Connecting my computer with an Ethernet cable
4.) Bringing my wireless connection closer to the router (with barely anything blocking)
5.) Turning off my router, waiting and then turning it back on

I honestly have no idea on what to do, as of course it is a new problem that I have been facing for the past 3 or so days (right before patch 5.6), thus I doubt it's a problem with my firewall and such. So I was wondering if any of you, REALLY SMART PEOPLE/Riot Admins and such have any idea on what i should do. Right now, im even sadder than {{champion:32}} with all 6 slots filled with {{item:3070}}  because he wasn't invited to any party. Please help! 

Yours Sincerely,


ZFenix

replies.body: I've been experiencing this issue for awhile as well and have found a solution to fix it (well it's working so far). If you are using a proxy server like WTFast try connecting to LoL without it. For some reason it was what was causing the issue for me. I hope this helps some of you.

I'm having the exact same thing now. Did you guys find any solution? I tried out everything still no luck. I've been having this these past 2 days, this problem came like all of a sudden.. Can anyone help please?

Thanks Dyne112

XD at least im not the only one who experiences THE EXACT SAME PROBLEM i mean if theres an issue like this praticly stopping any sort of action. Then why has rito done nothing about it and if it is common why aren't we finding alot more people who experience the same thing. i recommend to rito that before they plan their next rework/new champion/new skin/new gamemode ect.. that they take a look at the problems with these servers that people are complaining about and see if they can fix it. I have watched almost all their patch notes for about a year now and none mention anything about server problems at all. so my guess is that 1: rito does not pay attention to complaints or 2: no one is experiencing this and we might as well be the first ones to encounter it.  BTW did your issues begin right after URF 2015 mode if so then yours is the exact same as mine

I used to get this a lot.

And then, one day, it just stopped.

I don't even.

But, you can try the following:
1. Change your DNS to Google's Public one.
2. Disable IPv6 (only works on <Windows 8).
3. Disable all firewalls and anti-virus.
4. Attach your monitor to a jet and fly it out your room.

Try it all in that order, and if that doesn't work, get back to me with your OS and ISP and we'll sort something out.

Best of luck!

thanks for the help! I had a friend who helped me get through it and it stopped for now.. I'm with TPG too btw and hopefully this doesn't continue to occur... but if it does, I'll go through your steps and if that doesn't work... I shall get back to ya! :D 

Still sad about dropping a rank but all is well for now! :D

A low price to pay, since you can still ultimately play the game.

Best of rugk in the fields of justice!
It's been happening to me too. I'm with TPG
